attributes.action: Allow the voting public to democratically choose the countries next Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the announcement of Mr. Blair leaving office. Should the Labour party have the right to install Mr. Brown or another candidate as the next Prime Minister by default?

Should not the British public dictate who they want as their next Prime Minster, decided upon by a general election. Where clear policies and values are made apparent. Thereby giving the voter democratic choice in the running of their country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
